## Source: ossf-package-analysis (faed09cda269c58908aa898798259bd292fcce98a8f5a60f486a4c26bb84d15a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'rb-notification-banner' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
